item.description:
This was a suggestion at one of my previous brunches - and ask and you shall receive. I have been to this fabulous restaurant for drinks and apps but never tried out their brunch menu! But I am very excited cause the food was WONDERFUL the last time I was there.

Changing the reservation time on this - because they only except reservations at certain times. . . Also, I added a few more spots so more people could join in on the fun!!

Hope to see you all there!!
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation will be under Marie.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Highland Kitchen Brunch
